pull.title: depends: always configure with `--with-pic`
pull.body:
We currently do this sporadically. Not only amongst packages, but across OS's, i.e sometimes it's done for BSDs/Android, and sometimes not.

Configure with `--with-pic` globally instead. I think this generally makes more sense, and should not have any downsides.

See related discussion in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28846#discussion_r1399123100.

| Concept ACK | [theuni](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29488#pullrequestreview-1904582846) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Concept ACK.

I believe we historically used `--with-pic` per-platform because some platforms (win32 and/or darwin) spewed warnings when turning it on. Is that no longer true? IIRC for darwin, `pic` is the default, so the "no need to specify pic" warnings were doubly annoying.

Even if that's still the case, it makes more sense to use `--without-pic` for those platforms to override this more sane default.

> win32 and/or darwin) spewed warnings when turning it on. Is that no longer true? 

I haven't seen any warnings / issues across any platforms.

issue.title: Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency
issue.body:
The final step of #20160.

A bare minimum of legacy wallet code is kept in order to perform wallet migration. Migration of legacy wallets uses the independent BDB parser and a minimal `LegacyDataSPKM` that allows the legacy data to be loaded so that the migration can be completed.

All tests which tested legacy wallet behavior have been removed. The `--descriptors` and `--legacy-wallet` options are removed from the functional tests.

BDB has been removed as a dependency and documentation have been updated to reflect that.

Depends on #26596

verification.payload:
tree d460c4419c4060e454a7cbce3859686fca29cc63
parent 3d255dfb67aede71ed39aaa54f4bcad550910cb7
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1705406464 +0000
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1710430877 +0000

depends: always configure with --with-pic

We currently do this sporadically. Not only amongst packages, but across
OS's, i.e sometimes it's done for BSDs/Android, and sometimes not.

Configure with `--with-pic` globally instead. I think this generally
makes more sense, and should not have any downsides.

See related discussion in
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28846#discussion_r1399123100.

events.message:
depends: always configure with --with-pic

We currently do this sporadically. Not only amongst packages, but across
OS's, i.e sometimes it's done for BSDs/Android, and sometimes not.

Configure with `--with-pic` globally instead. I think this generally
makes more sense, and should not have any downsides.

See related discussion in
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28846#discussion_r1399123100.
